channel.title: Advance Object Spawning
channel.description: I am looking for a way to allow a player to spawn an object that can be seen by others and load when someone logs in. For example firemaking when the fire object is placed (2732) it only shows for the player that created it. I so far have it to show for everyone but once the players log out and in the object is gone.

item.title: Advance Object Spawning
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Most servers already have it. You’re creating local objects for the firemaking instead of global, which means the object will disappear upon logout and won’t be visible to other players.

Read full topic

item.title: Advance Object Spawning
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Create a list of spawned objects in the server. Whenever the player loads a new region, reload the list of objects for his region.

Read full topic
